settings.label: favicon
settings.info: This is the image that will appear on the browser's tab. Make sure its size is either 16x16 pixels or 32x32 pixels.

settings.label: Store Description
settings.info: Your store description is crucial for SEO. Make sure to describe what your store is all about while being concise and Google will show your store higher in the rankings. If you want to learn more about SEO [click here](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/fundamentals/seo-starter-guide)
